definition: marked by convention and conformity to customs or rules or styles, someone who conforms to established standards of conduct (especially in religious matters)
details:
adjective
- marked by convention and conformity to customs or rules or styles
= example: marked by convention and conformity to customs or rules or styles
- adhering to established customs or doctrines (especially in religion)
= synonyms: conforming
noun
- someone who conforms to established standards of conduct (especially in religious matters)
